subject: Re: Help! - Order #SSN1843 - Simsonn Vam Pro Interfering with Simsonn Plus X brake pedals
description_text:
Yes most likely. Nevertheless thank you for the help ? great product and
customer support

On Sat, 26 Jul 2025, 4:12 pm service@simsonn.com, <service@simsonn.com>
wrote:

> Hi Jackie A,
>
> This means the vibration is causing the PlusX control box to continuously
> touch the brake sensor, resulting in fluctuating signals.
>
>
> On Fri, 25 Jul at 6:41 PM , Jackie A <ourtearroar@gmail.com> wrote:
> Thank you for the help, the problem has been resolved.
>
> After grounding the box with the pedal, I managed to move the control box
> a little further down (away from the brake pedal) now everything works
> fines, even without playing the deadzone on the brake settings, and can
> apply 100% feedback on the Vam Pro x3 on Simhub without any issues.
>
> Again very much appreciate your support, highly recommended by my friends
> and others to you guys :)
>
> Kindest regards
> Jackie
> [image: image.png]
>
> 1784:4206036

conversations.body_text: Hi J,  We hope you can leave your positive review and share some photos, as this will also help many other customers on our official website.
